entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 1500 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 600 metres after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
